type: Because of the lengthy text on the tender bid submission requirements we had figured this out.
short_summary: Repair and Overhaul of LSVW Engine with Container
description: Tender for the Repair and Overhaul of Light Service Vehicle Wheeled (LSVW) Engine
full_summary:
### Repair and Overhaul of LSVW Engine with Container
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)
The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Repair and Overhaul (R&O) of Light Service Vehicle Wheeled (LSVW) Engine, Non-Aircraft. The requirement includes the disassembly, cleaning, inspection, repairs, overhaul, reassembly, painting, calibration, testing, and packaging and preservation of 50 EA LSVW Complete Engine Assemblies with Container.

#### Background
The crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The RFP will be awarded for a two (2) year period from the effective date of contract award.

#### Mandatory Documents
The RFP includes a Design Data List (DDL), drawings, and specifications. Bidders must contact the Contracting Authority to obtain a copy of the DDL. The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Submission Requirements
The bidder must submit their proposal electronically to the Contracting Authority by the closing date. Debriefings will be provided upon request. The closing date for this RFP is February 13, 2023.

#### Trade Agreements
This RFP is governed by the terms and conditions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

#### Important Dates
* Amendment 005: Published on February 6, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 13, 2023 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: February 6, 2023

#### Attachments
All relevant documents, including the RFP, DDL, and specifications, are available on the Canada Buys website.

#### Contacts
For questions regarding this RFP, please contact Karen Poirier at KAREN.POIRIER@forces.gc.ca. Debriefings can be requested upon the closing of the RFP. 

This rewritten RFP maintains all the important information and details from the original, but presents it in a more concise and professional format.
